content:
Did I miss something in my email (quite possible) or is the JupyterHub unexpectedly down? I'm seeing Spawner timeouts:

Screen-Shot-2021-01-26-at-12.29.43-PM.png
DAV is definitely up
Cheyenne?
I can also get a session on Cheyenne
I'll try it again.
Yep. It works for me, now, too. Thanks!
I am unable to access jupyterhub.ucar.edu. Just filed a CISLHelp ticket. @hpcd
jupyterhub.hpc.ucar.edu?
@Matt Long

yes, sorry: jupyterhub.hpc.ucar.edu.

It's back now. There was a notifier from Peter Buss reporting some network work right around the same time.
Do you have a help-desk ticket number?
Okay, were you trying to authenticate during this time?
No, I don't think so. I was already behind the auth layer.
I cannot log in to jupyterhub.hpc.ucar.edu this morning. Keep getting a timeout error at authentication (RC-11220).

Stephen Yeager said:

I cannot log in to jupyterhub.hpc.ucar.edu this morning. Keep getting a timeout error at authentication (RC-11220).

I've been having a hard time accessing the hub as well but Chrome has been giving me a message of "Your connection is not private" instead (with or without a vpn connection)
I've got a CISL ticket in regarding authentication timeouts. That's unfortunately outside the scope of HPCD.
I think you should be able to authenticate now.

I have also been having issues accessing the hub on chrome with the issue of the connection not being private. It works fine on firefox, but I prefer to use chrome. I think my chrome is up-to-date. Has anyone found a solution?
I am also still getting this message on Chrome. Any way to resolve this would be greatly appreciated!
If you are on chrome, you should be able to use the jupyterhub.hpc.ucar.edu link - I have been using that.
thanks, @Max Grover ! seems to be working for me now too! maybe I used the wrong link
Is the hub down for other folks? I keep getting a 504 Gateway Timeout
me too for about the last hour; I submitted a cisl help ticket.
It looks like Casper is down
PBS is having issues checking out licenses, so JupyterHub jobs will fail after a 10-minute timeout for server to start.
Anyone else seeing Gateway Timeout 504 on jupyterhub?
OK, I can login to jupyterhub now, never mind...
